cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature you control
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your life total is equal to enchanted creature's power, you win the game.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Despite the doubt of her friends, every night she prayed for a new life. Someone out there was sure to answer.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
[i]Anticipate[/i] — {T}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, your life total becomes 10. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
Untap all nonland permanents you control. Draw a card.

Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.
Target creature has base power and toughness 0/2 until your next turn.
You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, gain control of it.”
cards.special_text:
[+1]: Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.
[0]: Target creature has base power and toughness 0/2 until your next turn.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, gain control of it.”

cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may pay {B}. If you do, that creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]He rules as his three predecessors ruled—with an iron fist and zero tolerance for infractions against the regime.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

First strike
Whenever Cackling Rabblerouser deals combat damage to an opponent, look at the top three cards of your library. Put up to one creature card from among them onto the battlefield tapped and attacking, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Exile all cards put onto the battlefield this way at end of combat.

Exile your hand and the top seven cards of your library. You may play cards exiled this way this turn.
At the beginning of the next end step, you lose the game.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Not every story has a happy ending.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Lady Ilyrana Glyris enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf creature token for each Forest you control.
{6}{G}: You gain 1 life for each Elf and each Forest you control.

You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
You may play land cards from your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The elves aren't the only ones on Rocerynn with green thumbs.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
{WU}, {T}: Untap each other tapped creature you control that didn't attack this turn. Activate this ability only during your postcombat main phase.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You've stumbled upon the right gnome, lucky little sprites. You're not the first I've helped across the Vidyl Veldt, and you'll neither be the last.” [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Lifelink, vigilance
{1}{W}{B}, {T}: Reciprocal Torturer deals damage to target creature equal to the amount of damage that creature has dealt this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Delia quickly learned the consequences of stepping out of line.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash, hexproof
Splinterscale Pangolin can't be countered.
Masochism 3 [i](This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it if you've lost life this turn.)[/i]

Exile the top card of your library. You may cast it this turn. If it's an artifact, Daretti, the Iron Fist deals 2 damage to each opponent.
Gain control of target artifact. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
Create a colorless Bomb artifact creature token with “{R}, Sacrifice Bomb: Bomb deals 10 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.”
cards.special_text:
[+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast it this turn. If it's an artifact, Daretti, the Iron Fist deals 2 damage to each opponent.
[-2]: Gain control of target artifact. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.rules_text: {T}, Sacrifice X lands: Search your library for a nonland card with converted mana cost X and cast it without paying its mana cost, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Not even Domino himself knows the true power of his own ancient tome.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast Gang Up, tap any number of untapped creatures you control.
Exile target creature if it has power less than or equal to the total power of creatures tapped to cast Gang Up.

Flying
When Jubilant Collective enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put three +1/+1 counters on Jubilant Collective.
• Create three 1/1 white and blue Faerie creature tokens with flying.

Whenever you gain life, choose one, where X is the amount of life gained —
• Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature.
• Exile target artifact or enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.
• Return target permanent card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

When Spiritweaver Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
{2}{W}, {T}: You may put an Aura card from your hand onto the battlefield attached to target creature.

Lifelink
[i]Anticipate[/i] — {T}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, Curious Kitten gets +3/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
[i]Anticipate[/i] — {T}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, Tanpip Paladin gains double strike until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Always fight for what you believe in.”[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]“Come, children. Time for your very first lesson.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Create a 1/1 white and blue Faerie creature token with flying, then counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

cards.rules_text:
Flash
When Stoic Spellsnitch enters the battlefield, exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. If it would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.
Gain control of target creature with power 2 or less.
Destroy each creature that entered the battlefield this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The orders were harrowingly clear—kill anyone who tried to leave the castle, sprite, drow, or otherwise.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Jhalach Scoundrel enters the battlefield, discard your hand, search your library for up to two cards and put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor_text: [i]He gleefully exploits the naivety of the Glyris and the apathy of the Wriwth, pilfering what he pleases and leaving nothing but worthless scraps behind.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Masochism 3 [i](This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it if you've lost life this turn.)[/i]
When Juvenile Delinquent enters the battlefield, destroy target creature if it has power greater than Juvenile Delinquent's power.

At the beginning of each end step, if a creature you controlled died this turn, you draw a card and gain 1 life.
At the beginning of each end step, if you lost life this turn, you draw a card and gain 1 life.

Whenever a permanent card is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it. If you do, return target permanent card that shares a type with the exiled permanent from your graveyard to your hand.

Menace
Whenever Rooftop Renegade deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

Choose a card name, then target opponent reveals his or her hand and exiles all cards with the chosen name. If no cards were exiled this way, search that player's graveyard and library for any number of cards with the chosen name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

Enchant nonland permanent
At the beginning of each end step, if enchanted permanent attacked, blocked, or activated an ability this turn, its controller sacrifices it.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“A quick execution teaches no lesson.”
—King Jhalach IV[/i]

cards.rules_text: Until end of turn, up to two target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.”

cards.rules_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 1/1 white Gnome creature token.

cards.rules_text: When Scrupulous Gardener enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“No flower is too small to be properly cared for.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Territorial Direwolf gets +1/+1 and has trample as long as there is a land card in your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Try cutting down a single tree in dire wolf territory, then tell me who the real victim of habitat destruction is.”
—Pyrra, Glyris advisor[/i]

cards.rules_text: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“How can you expect to track a beast without first being able to track your own inner self?”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash [i](You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)[/i]
When Glyris Pacifist enters the battlefield, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

Reach
{3}{G}: Watchful Bowmaster gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“It takes a keen eye to patrol both the forest floor and the bright skies above.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Anticipate[/i] — {T}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You may hear the forest's song, but have you every truly listened?”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Trample
[i]Anticipate[/i] — {T}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, Lifeheart Clairvoyant gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.flavor_text: [i]Its vibrant pattern serves as both a lure to draw in its prey and a warning for other predators to steer clear.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]As spears and arrows flew, the mother grizzly decided to show the elves exactly why she was to be feared.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. [i](It can block creatures with flying.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Keep your eyes up, and you will never miss what may befall you.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Many assume the flowers give the potion its pinkish hue. Actually, it's the rat blood, but no one needs to know that.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Sanctum Compass: Search your library for a basic land card that shares a type with a land you control and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Sprites that leave the conclave are gifted with a golden compass that always points home.[/i]
[i]As it walks across the fallow field, its awkward, loping gait matches the rattling in its head to create a haunting rhythm that chills the bones.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Defender
Whenever Skull Rattler blocks a creature, that creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]After just seconds of its cackling, it becomes impossible to tell if it's the scarecrow's bones clattering or your own. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0.
Whenever equipped creature becomes blocked by a creature, it deals 1 damage to that creature.
Equip {3} [i]({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may attach Soothsayer's Staff to target creature you control.
